    Creates uptake data from mass measurements

    prepare_kin_dat.Rd

    Function calculates deuterium uptake for each time point in the original data with respect to the parameters.

    Usage

    prepare_kin_dat(
  dat,
  state = dat[["State"]][1],
  time_0 = min(dat[["Exposure"]]),
  time_100 = max(dat[["Exposure"]]),
  replicate = F,
  FD = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    dat

    experimental data read by HaDeX::read_hdx

    state

    biological state

    time_0

    minimal exchange control time point

    time_100

    maximal exchange control time point

    replicate

    idicator, if the replicate values should be provided, or aggregated

    FD

    idicator, if the time_100 value shoul be used as fully deuterated control, only for normalization purposes, or left as time point of measurement

    Value

    a data.frame object.

    See also

    HaDeX::read_hdx

    Examples

    kin_dat <- prepare_kin_dat(alpha_dat)
head(kin_dat)
#>   ID Exposure   Protein                     Sequence Start End       State
#> 1  1    0.167 db_eEF1Ba      GSSHHHHHHSSGLVPRGSHRSEF     2  24 ALPHA_Gamma
#> 2  2    0.167 db_eEF1Ba                       FMGFGD    24  29 ALPHA_Gamma
#> 3  3    0.167 db_eEF1Ba                FMGFGDLKSPAGL    24  36 ALPHA_Gamma
#> 4  4    0.167 db_eEF1Ba                        MGFGD    25  29 ALPHA_Gamma
#> 5  5    0.167 db_eEF1Ba MGFGDLKSPAGL+Oxidation M (1)    25  36 ALPHA_Gamma
#> 6  6    0.167 db_eEF1Ba              MGFGDLKSPAGLQVL    25  39 ALPHA_Gamma
#>   MaxUptake frac_deut_uptake err_frac_deut_uptake deut_uptake err_deut_uptake
